summary: ISO 3166 is a standard made by the International Organization for Standardization  and it uses short codes to name all countries and some other places.
full_text: ISO 3166 is a standard published by the International Organization for Standardization  that defines codes for the names of countries, dependent territories, special areas of geographical interest, and their principal subdivisions . The official name of the standard is Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions.
title: ISO 3166
